title: Aircraft carrier & destroyers: Decoding the firepower of Trump's 'beautiful armada' closing in on Iran
summary_full: Tensions between the United States and Iran are escalating. US President Donald Trump has warned Iran to negotiate a nuclear deal or face severe military action. A large US naval fleet, including an aircraft carrier and destroyers, is moving into West Asia. This deployment raises fears of an imminent military confrontation.
